attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: If true, this component will be checked for non-empty input.

attribute.name: validator
attribute.description: MethodBinding pointing at a method that will be called during Process Validations phase of the request processing lifecycle, to validate the current value of this component.

attribute.name: converter
attribute.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.
